Subject: Excess Property
Gentlemen, We have requirements for $ Drills, Bulletin No. 565, Page 2, Control No. 25154, Ites 1, Condition R-1. Please advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will immediately forward our purchase order. 140.112 213.82
